alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, Pasco, central Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Lake-Orient Park, or near Temple Terrace, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lakeland, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Lutz, Brandon, Holiday, Fish Hawk, St. Petersburg, St. Leo, New Port Richey East, Zephyrhills South, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park and Egypt Lake-Leto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
